name: rolph
text: Phew I made it. These excavators are horrible!

name: douglas
text: You don’t say! You are not safe here, there are more coming. We need to stop them and save the forest or all trees are lost… including yourself!

name: rolph
text: But how can I do this I’m just a tree, they won’t listen to me.

name: douglas
text: Well maybe you should have done something before…

name: douglas
text: Still there is hope, but you have to find it yourself.

name: douglas
text: Come over here and I'll give you a shove in the right direction
